publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-191.1 Nicola Sturgeon: Modernising Justiceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-191) in the name of Cathy Jamieson, insert at end ", and further recognises that the efficient administration of criminal justice depends on all parts of the system, not least on the Crown Office and Procurator Fiscal Service having adequate resources to meet the increasing demands placed on it."
